metas.description: Morphopoiesis is a notebook about the intersection of art, science, and technology.

shaders.title: Iterative Function System
shaders.description: Using an iterative function system to generate fractals. Move your mouse horizontally to increase the iterations.

shaders.title: Islamic Art
shaders.description: Using symmetry and transformations to create patterns

shaders.title: Neural Network
shaders.description: Artificial Neural Network for classification

shaders.title: Wave Function Collapse
shaders.description: WFC with aperiodic Wang tile set. Click the mouse to collapse cells. If you get a contradiction press the 'r' key to reset

shaders.title: Mandelbox
shaders.description: Mandelbox Fractal

shaders.title: Mobius
shaders.description: Mobius Transform

shaders.title: Fast Voronoi
shaders.description: A real-time voronoi construction using the jump flood algorithm.

shaders.title: Wave Equation
shaders.description: Background circle with 3 oscillators with prime frequency. Click the mouse for high frequency oscillations.

shaders.title: Video 360
shaders.description: Equirectangular 360 Video Viewer. Click on the video to play/pause.

shaders.title: Indra Pearls
shaders.description: An exploration of symmetry

shaders.title: genwgsl
shaders.description: A simple generator of WGSL shaders

shaders.title: webcam
shaders.description: webcam

shaders.title: Path Tracer
shaders.description: A real-time path tracer, with motion blur, depth of field, adaptative denoise, and several materials.

shaders.title: Limits to Growth
shaders.description: This is an exploration of the limits to growth, with a diffuse limited aggregation algorithm, inspired by the book of the same name by Donella H. Meadows, Dennis L. Meadows, JÃ¸rgen Randers, and William W. Behrens III.

shaders.title: Inversion
shaders.description: A circle inversion

shaders.title: Path Tracer
shaders.description: A simple path tracer

shaders.title: Fluid
shaders.description: Fluid simulator. You can play with your mouse to add color.

shaders.title: DLA
shaders.description: Diffuse Limited Aggregation, to create an Ice structure. You can play with your mouse to melt the ice.

shaders.title: Physarum
shaders.description: A slime mold building a transport network. You can play with your mouse to erase the chemical field.

shaders.title: Boids
shaders.description: Android birds trying to sync their movement and blinking. You can play with your mouse to attract them.

shaders.title: Reaction Diffusion
shaders.description: Move your mouse to explore the generation of different patterns.

shaders.title: Game of Life
shaders.description: Conway's Game of Life

shaders.title: Color IFS
shaders.description: A simple colorized IFS fractal
